cleaned_text: Aromatherapy We use aromatherapy in a treatment that we call [Aroma-serene massage](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ?gclid=Cj0KCQjwmpb0BRCBARIsAG7y4zb7aDkLDSmNle2NeFyY2QpAflOLC5EF1N2boK_6_XPFyxIOwcv_CnkaAlhpEALw_wcB). It is an exceptional mind, body and soul treatment that uses high quality essential oils in a gentle massage that targets your overall well-being. What are Essential Oils? They are naturally found in the seeds, bark, stems, roots, flowers, and other parts of plants. They are highly concentrated when distilled for purity, potency, and efficacy. They are used for a wide range of emotional and physical wellness applications. We use Doterra oils. Why do we use [Doterra Essential Oils](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ?gclid=Cj0KCQjwmpb0BRCBARIsAG7y4zb7aDkLDSmNle2NeFyY2QpAflOLC5EF1N2boK_6_XPFyxIOwcv_CnkaAlhpEALw_wcB)? Because they - are sourced from a global network of growers to ensure the most pure and efficacious essential oils. - are rigorously tested for purity and potency - are free from fillers or artificial ingredients - are free of harmful contaminants What are some of the benefits of massage using [Essential Oils](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/what-is-an-essential-oil)? Detox - Stimulates lymphatic system to release toxins with an artful blend of lemon, grapefruit and juniper. Relax - Lavender blend reduces inflammation and promotes tranquility. Invigorate - Enlivens the body and mind and increases circulation with mix of rosemary, mint and patchouli. Soothe - Rosemary, clove and sweet birch combine to alleviate the aches and pains of sore muscles. Recharge -Energizing citrus blend to awaken the senses. Unwind - Blends of orange, bergamot can help you unwind. Some of the common essential oils and blends we use are: - [Lavender](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/lavender-oil).. relaxing and calming - [Lavender Peace](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/lavender-peace-oil).. relaxing and calming - [Aromatouch](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/aromatouch-blend-oil).. relaxing and rejuvenating - [On Guard](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/on-guard-oil).. grounding and boost immune system - [Balance](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/balance-blend-oil).. grounding and balancing - [Cheer](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/cheer-blend-oil).. uplifting and uplifting Orange](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/wild-orange-oil).. uplifting and soothing - [Peppermint](https://www.doterra.com/NZ/en_NZ/p/peppermint-oil).. invigorating and soothing How Do I Use Essential Oils? Aromatic: Essential oils when diffused or inhaled, can be very stimulating, calming or soothing. Diffusing essential oils can also cleanse and purify the air. Flavouring: Certain essential oils can be used as dietary supplements for targeted wellness. We offer you a drop of Lemon or Wild Orange in your glass of water. Topical: Essential oils can be safely applied for massage or topical benefit when diluted with a carrier oil like fractionated coconut oil.
